CustomField.formula: IF (OR(AND((ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Effect")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Being Renewed")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Being Amended")))), HYPERLINK("/apex/APT_AmendRenew?agreementId=" & Id & "&actionName=Renew", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Renew", "Renew"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Renew
